title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, stream, list and pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open-WebUI): chat folders, model builder, RAG uploads, voice input, admin panel, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, custom timeouts and model management utilities.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Unofficial Go wrapper around Ollama’s REST API providing idiomatic Go functions and structs for chat/generate endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama: chat, generate, pull, delete and list models with simple Ruby syntax.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that pipes GitHub Copilot prompts through a local Ollama model for private code completion.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into channels/DMs using Bolt for Slack and Socket Mode.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in any pipeline.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and curated model derivations for NixOS and dev shells.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with async streaming, dependency-injection friendly and strongly-typed chat requests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings to Ollama’s REST API with serde models and streaming support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models from BPMN service tasks for human-like decision steps.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, rate-limiting and usage metrics.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama with session memory, model selector and markdown rendering.
